nl.vrom.roo.core.util

Class MessageBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.vrom.roo.core.util.MessageBundle

  • public final class MessageBundle
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class. It is possible to use registered message bundles but it is also possible to supply own resource bundles. Message bundles can be registered using MessageBundleRegistration.registerBundle(String, Locale).

    • Method Summary
